item.title: About me
item.description: Hello, my name is Manuel Vogel, and I’m striving to grow every day as a person and developer. Currently I’m working at Stocard as a DevOps Engineer, doing awesome stuff with terraform, Docker, TypeScript and bash. In my free time I maintain the terraform-provider-docker. I love automating things because I believe we’re all smart people and we should not be the robot but build the robot, for example by teaching non-engineering heroes how to achieve this well with this little black window, called terminal.
